title: Terry Pheto takes her first swimming lesson
text:
Terry Pheto takes her first swimming lesson share this

Cape Town - Award winning actress Terry Pheto decided to finally overcome her fear of water and took her very first swimming lesson.

READ MORE: Terry Pheto wins best actress award in London

The 38-year-old took to her Twitter account and shared the news.

“Today I finally decided to face my fear of water and take my first swimming lesson. Guess what, I didn’t die. BIG DEAL!!!”, she wrote.

Other stars who started learned how to swim later in life include John Legend and musician Steve Clark.

READ MORE: PICS: Terry Pheto shares breathtaking snaps from her France solo trip

It’s never too late to learn. And who knows, there might be a swimming role for Terry in future.

See Twitter reactions and comments here:

description: Award winning actress Terry Pheto decided to finally overcome her fear of water and took her very first swimming lesson.
